Name: 校园恋物语|Love in School
About the game: Campus love is not so much interest entanglement, only pure I love you and you love me. Love in School tells a short love story, simple and fresh. Games include: 20 minutes' story flow 10 scenes 1 persona Our group's first short story series, I hope you like it.
